alert.note: Alert for Jersey (Illinois) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Saint Louis (Eastern Missouri and West Central Illinois)
info.headline: Flood Warning issued May 06 at 9:25PM CDT until May 11 at 10:00AM CDT by NWS Saint Louis
info.description: ...The Flood Warning is extended for the following rivers in Missouri...Illinois... Mississippi River at Hannibal. Mississippi River at Mel Price LD. Mississippi River at Winfield. Mississippi River at Clarksville. Mississippi River at Louisiana. ...The Flood Warning continues for the following rivers in Missouri...Illinois... Mississippi River at St. Louis. Mississippi River at Grafton. River forecasts are based on observed precipitation and forecast precipitation for the next 24 hours. ...FLOOD WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL LATE WEDNESDAY MORNING... * WHAT...Minor flooding is occurring and minor flooding is forecast. * WHERE...Mississippi River at Grafton. * WHEN...Until late Wednesday morning. * IMPACTS...At 21.5 feet, In Portage des Sioux, MO, Le Sieur Street leading to the Marina and to Our Lady of the River Statue is flooded. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 9:00 PM CDT Friday the stage was 21.0 feet. - Recent Activity...The maximum river stage in the 24 hours ending at 9:00 PM CDT Friday was 21.0 feet. - Forecast...The river is expected to rise to a crest of 21.5 feet early tomorrow afternoon. It will then fall below flood stage early Tuesday morning. - Flood stage is 20.0 feet. && Fld Observed Forecasts (7 pm CDT) Location Stg Stg 7 pm Sat Sun Mon Tue Wed Mississippi River Grafton 20.0 21.0 21.5 21.0 20.2 19.6 18.9 &&
info.instruction: Motorists should not attempt to drive around barricades or drive cars through flooded areas. This product, along with additional weather and stream information, is available at https://water.weather.gov/ahps2/index.php?wfo=lsx.
